ques: 1. What happens when url.py file is edited while the development server is still running?
option2: b The development server automatically restarts.
option3: c) The development server does nothing.
option4: d The web page is automatically reloaded.
ans: b The development server automatically restarts.

ques: 2. Which setting contains the parameter of main-urls file?
3. Django is based on which framework?
4. Which method is used instead of path() in urls.py to pass in regular expressions as routes?
5. What does {{ name }} this mean in Django Templates?
option1: a) {{ name }} will be the output.
option2: b) It will be displayed as name in HTML.
option3: c) The name will be replaced with values of Python variable.
ans: c) The name will be replaced with values of Python variable.
